actions.name: Stolen Belonging
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hurl Stolen Belonging
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 20/60' one target 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Mad Dash
actions.desc: Moves up to twice its speed and can move through space of any creature that is Med or larger. When it moves through a creature's space creature must make DC 13 Dex save or fall prone. This move doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

bonus_actions.name: Nimble Escape
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Disengage or Hide action.

reactions.name: Run and Hide
reactions.desc: When a creature hinderling can see targets it with weapon hinderling chooses another creature within 5 ft. as attack's target then moves up to half its speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

special_abilities.name: Aura of Misfortune
special_abilities.desc: Creatures within 15 ft. of it treat attack rolls of 20 as 19 and can't gain advantage on ability checks attacks and saves.

special_abilities.name: Rejuvenation
special_abilities.desc: While hinderling curse remains on a victim a slain hinderling returns to life in 1 day regaining all its hp and becoming active again. Hinderling appears within 100' of victim.
